content.text:
# 1992 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation

The 1992 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation () was held in January 1993. It is part of the Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation series held in Hong Kong.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大勁歌金曲) of 1992 are as follows.
{|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;"
! Song name in Chinese
! Artist
|-
|  我來自北京
|  Leon Lai
|-
|  分手總要在雨天
|  Jacky Cheung
|-
|  真我的風采
|  Andy Lau
|-
|  還是覺得你最好
|  Jacky Cheung
|-
|  我的親愛
|  Leon Lai
|-
|  醒醒
|  Sandy Lam
|-
|  長夜多浪漫
|  Andy Lau
|-
|  情人知己
|  Sally Yeh
|-
|  第四晚心情
|  Aaron Kwok
|-
|  容易受傷的女人
|  Faye Wong
|-
|}
Additional awards
{|class="wikitable"
! Award
! Song name(if available for award)
! Recipient(s)
|-
| colspan=3 | The Most Popular Mandarin Song Award ( 最受歡迎國語歌曲獎 )
|-
| style="background:#FFCC00; color:black" align=right | Gold award
|style="text-align: center;" |  瀟洒走一回
| Sally Yeh
|-
| style="background:#C0C0C0; color:black" align=right | Silver award
|style="text-align: center;" |  對你愛不完
| Aaron Kwok
|-
| style="background:#CD7F32; color:black" align=right | Bronze award
|style="text-align: center;" |  認錯
| Ukulele (優客李林)
|-
| The Best Duet Song Award  ( 最受歡迎合唱歌曲獎)
|style="text-align: center;" |  相思風雨中
| Jacky Cheung, Karen Tong (湯寶如)
|-
| The Best Composition Award( 最佳作曲獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  瀟洒走一回
|
* Music composers: Chan Dai Lik (陳大力), Chan Sau Nam (陳秀男)
* Performed by: Sally Yeh
|-
| The Best Lyric Award( 最佳填詞獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  容易受傷的女人
|
* Lyrics by: Calvin Poon (潘源良)
* Performed by: Faye Wong
|-
| The Best Music Arrangement Award( 最佳編曲獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  瀟洒走一回
|
* Music Arrangement by: Ricky Ho
* Performed by Sally Yeh
|-
| The Best Song Producer Award( 最佳歌曲監製獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  真情流露
|
* Music producer: Michael Au
* Performed by: Jacky Cheung
|-
| colspan=3 | The Most Popular New Artist Award, Male singer ( 最受歡迎新人獎, 男歌手 )
|-
| style="background:#FFCC00; color:black" align=right | Gold award
|style="text-align: center;" |  ---
| Jimmy Lin
|-
| style="background:#C0C0C0; color:black" align=right | Silver award
|style="text-align: center;" |  ---
| Dicky Cheung
|-
| style="background:#CD7F32; color:black" align=right | Bronze award
|style="text-align: center;" |  ---
| Julian Cheung
|-
| colspan=3 | The Most Popular New Artist Award, Female singer  ( 最受歡迎新人獎, 女歌手 )
|-
| style="background:#FFCC00; color:black" align=right | Gold award
|style="text-align: center;" |  ---
| Veronica Yip
|-
| style="background:#C0C0C0; color:black" align=right | Silver award
|style="text-align: center;" |  ---
| Karen Tong (湯寶如)
|-
| style="background:#CD7F32; color:black" align=right | Bronze award
|style="text-align: center;" |  ---
| Elaine Ho (何婉盈)
|-
| The Best Music Video Award( 最佳音樂錄影帶獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  You & Me
|
* Director: Ronald Chin (錢國偉)
* Performed by: Aaron Kwok
|-
| The Best Music Video Performance Award( 最佳音樂錄影帶演出獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  紅日, 舊歡如夢
| Hacken Lee
|-
| The Most Popular Male Artist Award( 最受歡迎男歌星獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  ---
| Andy Lau
|-
| The Most Popular Female Artist Award( 最受歡迎女歌星獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  ---
| Sally Yeh
|-
| Gold Song Gold Award( 金曲金獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  分手總要在雨天
| Jacky Cheung
|-
| Jade Solid Gold Honour Award  ( 金曲銀禧榮譽大獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  ---
| Anita Mui
|-
|}
